```{r}
posterior_prop <- function(theta){
  
  return(
    (theta^3)*(1-theta)^13+
      (theta^4)*(1-theta)^12+
      (theta^5)*(1-theta)^11
  )
}

parametric_space <- seq(0.001,1,0.001)

plot(parametric_space,posterior_prop(theta=parametric_space),
     type='l',ylab=)
```

```{r Gibbs}

x_given_y <- function(y,x,C){
  numerator = NA
  denominator = NA
  #setting the numerator
  if(0<=y & y<=1){
    if(abs(x-y)<C){
      numerator = 1
    } else {
      return(0)
    }
  }
  #setting the denominator
  if(0<y & y<C){
    denominator <- y+C
  }else{
    if(C<=y & y<(1-C)){
      denominator <- 2*C
    }else{
      if(y>=(1-C) & y<=1){
        denominator <- 1-y+C
      }
    }
  }
  return(numerator/denominator)
}

y_given_x <- function(y,x,C){
  numerator = NA
  denominator = NA
  #setting the numerator
  if(0<=x & x<=1){
    if(abs(x-y)<C){
      numerator = 1
    } else {
      return(0)
    }
  }
  #setting the denominator
  if(0<x & x<=C){
    denominator <- x+C
  }else{
    if(C<x & x<=(1-C)){
      denominator <- 2*C
    }else{
      if(x>(1-C) & x<=1){
        denominator <- 1-x+C
      }
    }
  }
  return(numerator/denominator)
}
```
